name: Engine Armaments
description:
A game made in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

Shoot the other player in the arena to win! Splitscreen multiplayer is available and is the only way to play. (Given the times that might not have been the best idea but we rolled with it)

Controls

WASD and Arrow Keys to move

Left shift to drift as Player 1 (Left)

Left ctrl to fire as Player 1 (Left)

Right ctrl to drift as Player 0 (Right)

Right shift to fire as Player 0 (Right)

  • Credits
    • Code and SFX by Windzyboy
    • Other code by Senatorwhy
    • Art by tabbiverse
    • Music and SFX by Binks
      • Available on YouTube
    • https://opengameart.org/content/aim for the Reticle Texture
    • SFXR for sound effects
    • Acid Machine for music
  • Issues
    • No quit button; must use Alt+F4 or other method of tabbing out
    • Find any? https://sites.google.com/view/windzyboy/h
